item.title: Move backups in Recovery Service Vault from LRS/GRS to ZRS while not preserving the data
item.description:
Introduction Hello everyone, Andrew Coughlin here and I am a Cloud Solutions Architect at Microsoft focusing on Azure Infrastructure. I have frequently received questions from customers about how to move their virtual machines from an LRS/GRS recovery services vault to a recovery services vault that supports ZRS. As a reminder we have three options for storage replication for recovery services vaults:
